titles.title: Providing for the concurrence by the House with an amendment to the Senate amendment to the House amendments to S. 562.

action.text: Mr. Lazio moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 11/13/1997--Introduced. Provides that upon the adoption of this resolution the House of Representatives agrees to the Senate amendment with an amendment to S. 562 (home equity conversion mortgages).
